locations: Thunder Studios, Long Beach, California, USA
RMS Queen Mary - 1126 Queens Highway, Long Beach, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: This is the first bachelor series in the history of the internet featuring ten lovely ladies and one international playboy. Watch The Showstopper Shawn Valentino crown one lucky lady with the ultimate honor of being the first ever Miss Showstopper.
imdb.title: The Showstopper: The Playboy Next Door
akas: The Showstopper: The Playboy Next Door (United States)
